title: Dynasty Warriors 8
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, German.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  The latest title in the "DYNASTY WARRIORS" series of tactical action games, set in the Three Kingdoms era of ancient China, takes everything that made the previous titles so popular, and adds new layers of excitement. The ultimate "DYNASTY WARRIORS" is here at last!

contentRating.label: T (Teen)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: BASE THEME 1
childDownloads.description: A new camp theme, "Amusement Park", will be added, which can be selected under "Set Camp Theme" in Ambition Mode. A new music track will also help set the mood!

childDownloads.title: BASE THEME 2
childDownloads.description: A new Camp Theme, "Military," will be available to select under SET CAMP THEME in Ambition Mode. Additionally, new music tracks will become available to further enhance the theme.

childDownloads.title: BASE THEME 3
childDownloads.description: A new Camp Theme, "Sci Fi," will be available to select under SET CAMP THEME in Ambition Mode. Additionally, new music tracks will become available to further enhance the theme.

childDownloads.title: BASE THEME 4
childDownloads.description: A new Camp Theme, "Tropical," will be available to select under SET CAMP THEME in Ambition Mode. Additionally, new music tracks will become available to further enhance the theme.

childDownloads.title: BASE THEME 5
childDownloads.description: A new Camp Theme, "Retro," will be available to select under SET CAMP THEME in Ambition Mode.  Additionally, new music tracks will become available to further enhance the theme.

childDownloads.title: BGM PACK 1
childDownloads.description: Two new music tracks will be added that can be selected before battle or in the Sound Test.

childDownloads.title: BGM PACK 2
childDownloads.description: Two new music tracks will be added that can be selected before battle or in the Sound Test.

Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  The latest title in the "DYNASTY WARRIORS" series of tactical action games, set in the Three Kingdoms era of ancient China, takes everything that made the previous titles so popular, and adds new layers of excitement. childDownloads.title: Japanese Voice Option
childDownloads.description: Play DYNASTY WARRIORS 8 with voices in the original Japanese.

childDownloads.title: NEW STAGE & BGM PACK 1
childDownloads.description: The new battlefield "Bowangpo (DLC 1)" will be added to Free Mode. Furthermore, you can obtain the steed Gray Lightning in "Bowangpo Animal Battle". New music tracks will be added that can be selected before battle or in the Sound Test. Eight tracks from "Dynasty Warriors 3" will be added.

childDownloads.title: NEW STAGE & BGM PACK 2
childDownloads.description: The new battlefield "Yu Province (DLC 2)" will be added to Free Mode. Furthermore, you can obtain a new animal, Mammoth, in "Yu Province Animal Battle". New music tracks will be added that can be selected before battle or in the Sound Test. Eight tracks from "DW4" will be added.

childDownloads.title: NEW STAGE & BGM PACK 3
childDownloads.description: The new battlefield "Jiangdong (DLC 3)" will be added to Free Mode. Furthermore, you can obtain a new animal, White Tiger, in "Jiangdong Animal Battle". New music tracks will be added that can be selected before battle or in the Sound Test. Eight tracks from "DW5"will be added.

childDownloads.title: NEW STAGE & BGM PACK 4
childDownloads.description: The new battlefield "Mount Qi (DLC 4)" will be added to Free Mode. Furthermore, you can obtain a new animal, Flame Wolf, in "Mount Qi Animal Battle". New music tracks will be added that can be selected before battle or in the Sound Test. Eight tracks from "DW6" will be added.

childDownloads.title: NEW STAGE & BGM PACK 5
childDownloads.description: The new battlefield "Nanzhong (DLC 5)" will be added to Free Mode. Furthermore, you can obtain a new animal, Blue Bird, in "Nanzhong Animal Battle". New music tracks will be added that can be selected before battle or in the Sound Test. Eight tracks from "DW7" will be added.

childDownloads.title: NEW STAGE 6
childDownloads.description: The new battlefield "Yangping Gate (DLC 6)" will be added to Free Mode.  Furthermore, you can obtain a new animal, Speckled Mahogany, in "Yangping Gate Animal Battle."

childDownloads.title: NEW STAGE 7
childDownloads.description: The new battlefield "Liang Province (DLC 7)" will be added to Free Mode.  Furthermore, you can obtain a new animal, Polar Bear, in "Liang Province Animal Battle."

childDownloads.title: NEW STAGE 8
childDownloads.description: The new battlefield "Hanshui (DLC 8)" will be added to Free Mode.  Furthermore, you can obtain a new animal, Saber-toothed Tiger, in "Hanshui Animal Battle."

childDownloads.title: NEW WEAPON PACK 1
childDownloads.description: Additional stages will be added to Free Mode in which new versions of each weapon type will be available to acquire. There are a total of 26 new weapons available for acquisition in this set.

childDownloads.title: NEW WEAPON PACK 2
childDownloads.description: Additional stages will be added to Free Mode in which new versions of each weapon type will be available to acquire. There are a total of 26 new weapons available for acquisition in this set.

childDownloads.title: NEW WEAPON PACK 3
childDownloads.description: Additional stages will be added to Free Mode in which new versions of each weapon type will be available to acquire. There are a total of 35 new weapons available for acquisition in this set.

childDownloads.title: NEW WEAPON PACK 4
childDownloads.description: Additional stages will be added to Free Mode in which new versions of each weapon type will be available to acquire. There are a total of 26 new weapons available for acquisition in this set.

childDownloads.title: NEW WEAPON PACK 5
childDownloads.description: Additional stages will be added to Free Mode in which new versions of each weapon type will be available to acquire. There are a total of 26 new weapons available for acquisition in this set.

childDownloads.title: NEW WEAPON PACK 6
childDownloads.description: Additional stages will be added to Free Mode in which new versions of each weapon type will be available to acquire. There are a total of 25 new weapons available for acquisition in this set.

childDownloads.title: NEW WEAPON PACK 7
childDownloads.description: Six new versions (a powerful version and a unique version) of the recently released new weapon type, "Flame Blade," "Revolving Crossbow,"  "Sabatons," "Emei Piercers," "Bladebow," and "Paired Fans," will be made available.

childDownloads.title: NEW WEAPON PACK SET 1
childDownloads.description: Additional stages will be added to Free Mode in which new versions of each weapon type will be available to acquire. New versions of all 77 weapon types from the original game are available for acquisition in this set.

childDownloads.title: NEW WEAPON PACK SET 2
childDownloads.description: Additional stages will be added to Free Mode in which new versions of each weapon type will be available to acquire. New versions of all 77 weapon types from the original game are available for acquisition in this set.

childDownloads.title: OLD COSTUME PACK 1
childDownloads.description: The "DYNASTY WARRIORS 6" costumes for all 46 playable characters who appeared in that title will become available for selection under CHANGE OUTFIT.

childDownloads.title: OLD COSTUME PACK 2
childDownloads.description: The "DYNASTY WARRIORS 5" costumes for all 46 playable characters who appeared in that title will become available for selection under CHANGE OUTFIT.

childDownloads.title: OLD COSTUME PACK 3
childDownloads.description: The "DYNASTY WARRIORS 4" costumes for all 46 playable characters who appeared in that title will become available for selection under CHANGE OUTFIT.

childDownloads.title: OLD COSTUME PACK 4
childDownloads.description: The "Dynasty Warriors" costumes for Cao Cao, Zhou Yu, Lu Xun, Guan Yu and Zhang Fei will become available for selection under CHANGE OUTFIT.
